episodes.title: [President Ferdinand] Marcos answers questions regarding police ops on Quiboloy
episodes.description:
President Ferdinand Marcos Jr answers questions about the police operations happening in Davao City for the arrest KOJC Leader Pastor Apollo Quiboloy, during an interview at the Malacañang Palace on Tuesday, August 27.

episodes.title: Cops, Quiboloy supporters in standoff in Davao City
episodes.description:
Police and supporters of Pastor Apollo Quiboloy are currently locked in a standoff in Davao City on Sunday night, August 25.

As of 10:40 p.m., at least 1,000 Kingdom of Jesus Christ members are holding a protest in front of their compound in Buhangin District.

Police Regional Office-11 chief Police Brig. Gen. Nicolas Torre II  asked the KOJC members to disperse from the Philippines-Japan Friendship Highway.  

READ MORE: https://mb.com.ph/2024/8/25/chinese-ships-ram-shoot-water-jets-at-bfar-vessel-in-wps-says-task-force
